Description:
The FHIR Goal resource defines objectives for a patient based on a current condition or recent procedure. The goal can be long-term, such as targeting a specific HgbA1c level after a diabetes diagnosis, or shorter term such as changing wound dressings routinely following a procedure.

The search interaction enables the client to query for goals based on status or goal category. The search endpoint requires a patient ID. Goals are not filterable by active date.

A user or staff member accessing this FHIR resource must have access to the patient's chart or care plan.

Additionally, a provider must have security to see problems/conditions related to a goal.

A MyChart user accessing this FHIR resource must be authorized to view goal information for the patient in MyChart.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Based on  the category number by default, with Title and then Synonym as backups. Can use SNOMED if OID is specified and a mapping table has been built by the Epic community member. Ex: treatment, dietary, or behavioral.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided. If both are provided, they must match.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
The current status of the goal. The following values are supported:

  • in-progress,
  • achieved
  • cancelled

subject.Name: subject
subject.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided. If both are provided, they must match.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

addresses.Name: addresses
addresses.Description: Issues addressed by this goal. Reference to a Problems resource that this goal addresses.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Based on  the category number by default, with Title and then Synonym as backups. Can use SNOMED if OID is specified and a mapping table has been built by the Epic community member.

description.Name: description
description.Description: What the goal entails. SNOMED code or other text describing the goal.

expressedBy.Name: expressedBy
expressedBy.Description: Who is responsible for creating the goal. "Author" in DSTU2.

startDate.Name: startDate
startDate.Description: When pursuit of the goal begins.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
The current status of the goal. The following values are supported:

  • in-progress,
  • achieved
  • cancelled

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Who the goal is intended for. Patient FHIR Resource ID.

total.Name: total
total.Description: Total resources that match the search criteria.
